fullText: Ghost the Musical is a show that seems to have been created by committee, with each member assigned to tick off items from a list of what makes a successful Broadway musical.
dtliExcerpt: Ghost the Musical is a show that seems to have been created by committee, with each member assigned to tick off items from a list of what makes a successful Broadway musical.
bwwExcerpt: “Ghost,” with a book and lyrics by Bruce Joel Rubin, who (unbelievably) won an Oscar for the movie’s screenplay; and music and lyrics by Dave Stewart (of the fab 1980s synth-pop duo the Eurythmics — say it ain’t so!) and Glen Ballard, may not be the very worst musical ever made from a movie.
